name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Simple View - Hide distractions & more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus tool for YouTube: control distracting elements and autoplay settings to stay focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Simple View provide features that minimize some of the unnecessary distractions in the web interface and overall experience while watching youtube videos.

Imagine the times you try to watch a single video during work, only to end up clicking through the sidebar suggestions multiple times and losing focus.
Or when a video ends and the next one starts playing automatically because you forgot to turn off autoplay.

This extension helps you stay focused by eliminating these distractions.

Features:

★ Turn off auto-play — Automatically uncheck the auto-play setting to prevent subsequent videos from playing after the current video ends.
★ Hide Sidebar — Hide or unhide the sidebar section from the layout.
★ Hide Comments — Hide or unhide comments.
★ Hide end-screen suggestions — Hide or unhide recommended videos and interactive cards that typically appear at the end of a video (Note: excludes the channel name card).
★ Hide end-screen navigation — Hide or unhide the navigation buttons that appear at the end of a video.
